snippet: Mrs. Clinton’s aides, for the most part, believe Jeb Bush will win the Republican nomination, so she is jabbing at him on issues where they think he is vulnerable.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, sensing likelihood that Jeb Bush will capture 2016 Republican nomination, assails Bush during Colorado appearance; tactic allows Clinton to shift focus to policy rather than defending herself from Republican criticism on issues ranging from her personal email to Clinton foundation.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton’s aides, for the most part, believe Jeb Bush will win the Republican nomination, so she is jabbing at him on issues where they think he is vulnerable.

headline.main: Seeing Likely Nominee, Hillary Clinton Hits Jeb Bush Hard
headline.print_headline: Seeing Likely Nominee, Clinton Hits Bush Hard
